attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Fred Goodwin continues to cause serious public distress. We petition that he is stopped from shirking his failures by taking a grotesque pension and that as his considerable greed discredits and undermines both the UK and its government, he lose his knighthood forthwith.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
